full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE BSRUNG MA RNAMS LA 'PHRIN LAS DRAG PO GNYER DU GTAD PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA DAM CAN DMAG DPUNG BSKUL BA'I RNGA SGRA DRAG PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES RDO RJE BSRUNG MA RNAMS 'PHRIN LAS DRAG PA GNYER DU GTAD PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA DAM CAN DMAG DPUNG BSKUL BA'I RNGA SGRA DRAG PO ZHES BYA BA NI, DAM SRI SNYING LA BZHUGS PA'I SKYE BO 'GA' ZHIG GIS NYES MED DU BRNYAS SHING 'THO MTSAMS PAR BZOD PA @009B BSTEN KHUL GYIS PA, 'KHOS 'KHYER ZHAN PAR GO STE GNOD 'TSE'I BSAM SBYOR GTING RE ZAB KYIS MGO LA RIL BRDUNG BYED PAR RTZOM PA NA, BSTAN BSRUNG DAM CAN RGYA MTSOR RA MDA' SPRO NA PA'I PHYIR DU, SMYON PA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS KHROS 'KHRUGS RNGAMS PA'I SEMS KYIS BYUNG RGYAL DU SMRAS PA'O, ,)
